module.title: Server: Syslog
module.description:
Extends server by system log.
Sends mail to developer with exception trace if a developer mail address is defined. This module can extend normal or server applications but will need an installed application base with mail support.
**Features:** list> - stores exceptions into log file (serialized) - can send mails to one or more mail receivers <list
**Invokation:** code> ... catch( Exception $e ){ $this->env->getCaptain()->callHook( 'Env', 'logException', $this, array( 'exception' => $e ) ); } ... <code
If you are sure, that this module is installed, you can use: code> ... catch( Exception $e ){ Controller_System_Log::handleException( $e ); } ... <code Of course, this method is not the best way, since you bind your code to this module. Please think about using the hook instead.
module.log: Add mail component for collecting exceptions facts for HTML and text mail.
module.author: Christian Würker
